problem_names: lemma pick[simp]: "x \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> pick X \<in> X"
translations: lemma pick[simp]: "x \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> pick X \<in> X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> pick X \<in> X

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> (SOME x. x \<in> X) \<in> X

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> pick X \<in> X
